dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) is an evaluation platform for general agents, providing a suite of Atari games for benchmarking reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)

dcterms:description: AlphaGo Zero is a reinforcement learning algorithm that mastered the game of Go without any human knowledge, using self-play and deep neural networks.
dcterms:title: AlphaGo Zero

dcterms:description: AlphaZero is a general reinforcement learning algorithm that mastered chess, shogi, and Go through self-play, demonstrating the effectiveness of deep learning and Monte Carlo tree search.
dcterms:title: AlphaZero

dcterms:description: Polygames is a framework that improves zero learning for general game playing, enabling the training of AI models across various board games.
dcterms:title: Polygames

dcterms:description: Ludii is a general game system that supports a wide variety of games through a user-friendly game description language, facilitating the implementation and evaluation of game-playing AI.
dcterms:title: Ludii

dcterms:description: Game Description Language (GDL) is a low-level logic-based language for describing games, allowing for general game playing agents to interpret and run arbitrary games.
dcterms:title: GDL (Game Description Language)
